basics.name: Yan Rabefaniraka
basics.label: Student at ENSEEIHT french engineering school in Comp Sci
basics.summary: Currently studying at ENSEEIHT, I am a student in computer science. I am passionate about new technologies and I am always looking for new challenges.

work.name: MFX (Inria Nancy)
work.summary: 6 weeks internship in the MFX team at Inria Nancy. The goal of this internship was to develop a Python tool that could help the team manage their machine profiles for their 3D slicing software.
highlights: Technical study of the software and the machines
Assisting the team in their daily tasks and practical experiments

volunteer.summary: Yearly event organized by the COMITE LIBRE POUR L'ACCOMPLISSEMENT DES CPPIADES association. The goal of this event is to gather students from all over France to participate in sports competitions. I was in charge of the acommodation department and I also developed and updated part of the website for the event.
highlights: General staffing (cleaning, welcoming, match management, cloackroom management.)

volunteer.summary: I am currently a candidate for my school's photography association. For now, I participated in photographing the school's Halloween party.

education.institution: ENSEEIHT - National School of Electrical Engineering, Electronics, Computer Science, Hydraulics and Telecommunications
Classe Préparatoire aux Grandes Ecoles - Prépa des INP
education.area: Engineering with a focus on Computer Science

skills.name: Soft Skills
keywords: Cleaning (believe me I'm good at it)

projects.name: E-portfolio using Jekyll, Github Pages and the Al-Folio template
projects.summary: This is my e-portfolio. It is a static website generated using Jekyll and hosted on GitHub Pages. It is a simple and efficient way to present my resume and my projects.

projects.name: 3D printer profile manager - {Printer-to-lua}
projects.summary: This is a Python tool that I developed during my internship at Inria Nancy. It is a simple and efficient way to manage the machine profiles for the 3D slicing software used by the MFX team.
highlights: Technical study of the software and the machines
Assisting the team in their daily tasks and practical experiments
